The surface is nonexistent. As long as the altimeter reads above zero, you\'ll survive. The zero level on the altimeter is (as far as I\'m aware) the 'surface' where the auto-kill is initiated. I think it\'s about 65M meters 'above' where the point-source of light/gravity is.

That\'s why i put it in '', but i mean the point of no return or disintegration...

As best I can determine, ~4,700 km above the nominal surface*. Lower may actually be possible, but orbits can get messy this far in. Blame the Kraken.

*The nominal radius of Kerbol is 65,400 km FWIW.
